Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I've been playing KSP since early 2012, but just decided to join the forum recently. This is by far my favorite game. The scenery never ceases to amaze me, and every launch, explosion, and landing just adds more excitement to the game. Can't wait to see what the future updates have in store.
Welcome aboard! We have explosions and snacks!
Welcome to the friendliest corner of the web!

Welcome aboard! We have explosions and snacks!

And the snacks are explosion-flavored!

Welcome to the forums, and Happy explosions!

Still feels a bit weird to not see old Capt'n Skunky say that (old forum manager, if anyone was wondering).
